(Zardus wanted a showdown between Annhialator and Unitron)

Unitron/Anubis/Hades/Serpentor/Koga Shuko



Koga Shuko watched Anubis and Hades come up to the bridge, followed by 
Unitron.

"Excellent! Hopefully we killed some Maximals."

"We didn't." Unitron replied coldly.  "We lost fifty kilos of energon, and 
angered the Maximals.  You're an idiot."

"What!?  You dare sa--"

Koga Shuko was interrupted as eight laser bolts hit him in the sternum, in 
the same place, piercing through his armor and barely missing his spark, but 
not enough to erupt out the other side of his body.

The wealthy Predacon collapsed to the ground, not moving, but not in stasis 
lock.

---

Anubis gasped, taking out his plasma rifle, but a laser rifle hit him in the 
face, knocking back, causing the Predacon to drop his rifle next to the 
thrown laser rifle.

---

Hades took out his laser rifle, another laser rifle flying through the air, 
knocking it out of his hands.

---

Unitron walked over to Hades, catching a fist in his palm, twisting the wrist 
the fist belonged too, an uppercut punch knocking Hades back.

---

Anubis charged forward, extending his golden 5 in claws, slashing down at 
Unitron's chest.  

But the robot resembling Unicron blocked the attack at the wrist with his 
arm, a few punches to the abdomen causing Anubis to fall back, a roundhouse 
kick making a claning noise as Unitron's foot crashed into Anubis' chin, 
sending him flipping through the air, crashing to the metallic surface of the 
craft.

---

Hades cursed madly, jumping forward, slamming Unitron to the ground.  A white 
fist knocked Hades in the jaw a few times, a headbutt causing Hades to grasp 
his own head, another punch knocking him off of Unitron.

Unitron got to his feet.  "Prepare to be one with the Void." he spoke with no 
emotion, an energy sword appearing his hand as Hades charged him, Unitron 
sidestepping, slashing horizontally, smiling as he saw Hades hit the ground.  
In two pieces, a pool of mech-fluid quickly forming.

Anubis cursed, firing two optic blasts, piercing into Unitron's chest plate.  
"DIE, TRAITOR!"

Unitron fired three optic blasts, piercing through Anubis' neck, sending the 
Predacon with the name of an Egyptian god sprawling backwards, mech-fluid 
leaking from his neck, going into stasis lock.

Turning his back to the doorway, Unitrn lifted up Koga Shuko punching him a 
few times, throwing him to the ground violently. 

"Your usefulness, <EM>Master</EM> Shuko, is over.  Hail the Decepticons!  You 
can stay alive long enough to witness your end.  Though, unfortunately for 
me, you want live long enough to watch all your assets go to Firestarter back 
on Cybertron, to help the Decepticon Empire's cause."

Serpentor walked silently as usual, about to yell at Shuko about never 
getting any help, when his chin dropped to the floor as it were, seeing the 
mess.

-Right-, he thought in his mind, -I'll...just go elsewhere- Serpentor ran for 
the nearest access hatch out of the base.

---

Unitron turned his head, firing off three optic blasts, piercing into the 
metallic wall where Serpentor had been.  But there was nothing there.

Unitron looked to Annhialator.  "Ready to die, fool?"
